yahtzee

Class DicePad

  • java.lang.Object
    • yahtzee.DicePad

  • public class DicePad
extends java.lang.Object
    dicepad is an object which offers a place for the dice to be rolled on. It controls painting, rolling times, acknowledges and calls other objects and their method when all dice is has just stopped rolling
    Author:
    Marek Zidek
